info.name: Better Todoist by @bragasociopata
info.description:
Better appearance for Todoist. Updated for v915.
https://github.com/thiagobraga/better-todoist
info.additionalInfo:
✔ Using PT Sans font  
✔ Smaller project circles  
✔ Smaller emojis  
✔ Squared tasks checkbox  
✔ Emphasis on the task time  
✔ Priorities border in the left like mobile app  
✔ Tested in Ubuntu 18.04
